author: Stereogum
title: Amber Coffman Shares Statement About Her Departure From Dirty Projectors
text: Amber Coffman released her single " All To Myself " last fall and revealed plans to release her debut solo LP on Columbia. Now, as she prepares to announce the album, Coffman has shared the following statement with Stereogum regarding her departure from Dirty Projectors: Dave and I indeed broke up in the summer of 2012, … More »
